```{r}
# install.packages('arules')
library(arules)
dataset = read.csv('Acme_Innovations_market_basket_sample.csv', header = FALSE)
dataset = read.transactions('Acme_Innovations_market_basket_sample.csv', sep = ',', rm.duplicates = TRUE)
summary(dataset)
itemFrequencyPlot(dataset, topN = 10)
```

###Training Apriori on the dataset
```{r}
rules = apriori(data = dataset, parameter = list(support = 0.04, confidence = 0.2))
```

### Visualising the results
```{r}
inspect(sort(rules, by = 'lift')[1:10])
```
